com.conceptwave.scripting
Class Basket

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject
          com.conceptwave.scripting.OrderItem
              com.conceptwave.scripting.OrderGroup
                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Basket

public class Basket
extends OrderGroup

Implements a basket of basket items Maintains a basket instance document and list of additional item relations

Constructor Detail

Basket

public Basket()
Method Detail

add

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object add(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object item,
                                            com.conceptwave.scripting.Object parentObjOrID,
                                            String association,
                                            Date requestTime,
                                            com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibility,
                                            com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean checkGroup,
                                            com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreContainedItems,
                                            com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibilityError)
Adds an item and all its mandatory children recursively to the basket. only if the item and its mandatory children are eligible for the action. If parentObjOrId is specified, the logic will check if there is a relation (item relation) between the item and this parent basket item. Also eligibility rule will be checked for this relation if ignoreEligibility is set to false.

Parameters:
item - Item code or item object to be added
parentObjOrID - of the item from a relation, can be a basket item or basket item ID.
association - The association code
requestTime - The request time
ignoreEligibility - A flag on whether to run eligibility rule on add action or not. Default to false.
checkGroup - A flag on whether to check group validations. Default to false.
ignoreContainedItems - A flag on whether to skip the contained items. Default to false.
ignoreEligibilityError - A flag on whether to skip throwing exception when eligibility rule return false. If true, ignore failure. If false, throw exception. Default to false.
Returns:
If successful, the list of added basket items. If there are error (eg. eligibility rule failed for item/item association), errorList object will be return and no exception will be thrown.

Notes: Mandatory children of a basket item are the children that have "contains" relationship with the parent basket item.

canAdd

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object canAdd(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object item,
                                               Date requestTime)
Deprecated. This method is deprecated and should not be used anymore. There is no alternative.

Checks if an item can be added the basket. Checks eligibility rule and group

Parameters:
item - itemCode or item definition object.
requestTime - request time.
Returns:
list of error messages if can not add, otherwise return null.

createBasketItem

public BasketItem createBasketItem(String itemCode,
                                   Date requestTime)
Creates a new basket item with a given catalog item code

Parameters:
itemCode - The catalog item code
requestTime - The requestTime
Returns:
The basket item

createCopy

public Basket createCopy(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean keepID)
Copies this basket into a new basket instance. The new basket instance will be independent from the original basket. All basket ID and basket item IDs will change.

Parameters:
keepID - Indicates if the same IDs will be used (Clone) or not (Copy)
Returns:
Returns a new basket instance.

createRelation

public Document createRelation(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object sourceItem,
                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Object relatedItem,
                               String relationType)
Adds a new relation of given type between a specified source and related object. The source and the related object can be basket items or string identifiers of other type of objects. This relation is the basket item relation and this is different from the item relation. This method is used by application to create custom relation between basket item.

Parameters:
sourceItem - Basket item or source id (string)
relatedItem - Basket item or related id (string)
relationType - Relation type code (string)
Returns:
The relation document (cwt_pcoe:basketItemRelation)

Notes: When the source or the related object is passed in as a string, it does not have to be a valid basket item ID. In this case, the ID will be considered as an "external ID", which implies the relationship is from an external entity that is not in this basket.

createSnapshot

public void createSnapshot()
Creates a snapshot of the current basket, which can later be used to restore the basket. All basket ID and basket item IDs will remain the same as those of the original basket.

deleteFromDB

public static com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean deleteFromDB(String basketId)
Deletes the basket contents from the database.

Parameters:
basketId - The ID of the basket.
Returns:
true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.

deleteRelation

public Document deleteRelation(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object relationship)
Deletes a relationship between two basket items. This relation is the basket item relation and this is different from the item relation. This method is used by application to delete custom relation between basket item.

Parameters:
relationship - The relationship object, or the relationship string ID
Returns:
The deleted relationship if successful, or null if the relationship doesn't not exist

relationType - Relation type code (string)

forcedAdd

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object forcedAdd(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object item,
                                                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Object parentObjOrID,
                                                  String association,
                                                  Date requestTime,
                                                  com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibilityError)
Adds an item and all its mandatory children recursively to the basket without checking if they are eligible for the action.

Parameters:
item - Item code or item object to be added
parentObjOrID - of the item from a relation, can be a basket item or basket item ID
association - The association code
requestTime - The request time
ignoreEligibilityError - A flag on whether to skip throwing exception when eligibility rule return false. If true, ignore failure. If false, throw exception. Default to false.
Returns:
The list of added basket items or an ErrorList object

forcedRemove

public ErrorList forcedRemove(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object basketItemOrID,
                              com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hardDelete,
                              com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibilityError)
Removes an item and all its mandatory children recursively from the basket without checking if they are eligible for the action.

Parameters:
basketItemOrID - item object to be removed, can be a basket item or basket item ID
hardDelete - Boolean value:
  • If true the basket item is physically deleted from the basket
  • If false it is marked as deleted, but not physically deleted from the basket
    By default, this value is false.
    ignoreEligibilityError - A flag on whether to skip throwing exception when eligibility rule return false. If true, ignore failure. If false, throw exception. Default to false.
    Returns:
    the ErrorList object if any, or null if there are no errors

    migrateBasket

    public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object migrateBasket(String[] basketItems,
                                                      Date targetTime,
                                                      com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibility)
    Migrate basket items to target time(If list is empty, it will migrate whole basket, otherwise migrate the given basket items), and rebuild the basket. Migrate basket item action will delete all invalid basket leaves, update default value of basket leaves, populate new basket leaves, delete all basket item charges. Rebuild the basket action will remove invalid basket items and basket relations.

    Parameters:
    basketItems, - the list of basket item id which need to be migrated. If list is null or empty, it will migrate the whole basket.
    targetTime, - the target request time
    ignoreEligibility, - a flag on whether to run eligibility rule on rebuild action or not. Default to false.
    Returns:
    false: basket is original basket, no change required. true: item version changed, basket is valid after migration. error list: ErrorList object with the errors found after migration.

    price

    public void price(String[] currencies)
    Calculates the charges for all items in the basket. Once calculated, the user can use the getCharges method on each basket item to determine the associated charges for that basket item.

    Parameters:
    currencies - represents the list of currencies code. For example, CAD. The list of currencies will be used to filter the charges that will be included in the pricing.
    Throws:
    CwfException - code DE6242 will be throw if currency code enter is invalid

    readFromDB

    public static Basket readFromDB(String basketId,
                                com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean throwException,
                                com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean readInBulk)
    Reads the basket contents from the database.

    Parameters:
    basketId - The ID of the basket.
    throwException - If the basket is not in the database and the parameter is true, the exception DE9258 will be thrown. If the parameter is false the API will return null if the basket is not in the database. By default, this parameter is false.
    readInBulk - If this parameter is false, the basket will be loaded in a lazy-loading manner. The API will complete quickly because the basket items are not read up front from DB. They are loaded only when used. If this parameter is true, all the items in the basket will be loaded up front. The API will take longer time to complete, but avoid subsequent reads from DB. readInBulk significantly reduces the number of DB operations, so it should be used if you consider accessing many items in the basket.
    Returns:
    The new basket object or null

    remove

    public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object remove(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object basketItemOrID,
                                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean checkEligibility,
                                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hardDelete,
                                               com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibilityError)
    Removes a basket item from the basket

    Parameters:
    basketItemOrID - The basket item to remove, which can be a basket item or basket item ID
    checkEligibility - Boolean value
  • If true, performs eligibility check on the removal action.
  • If false, skips eligibility check.
    By default, this parameter is false.
    hardDelete - Boolean value:
  • If true the basket item is physically deleted from the basket
  • If false it is marked as deleted, but not physically deleted from the basket
    By default, this value is false.
    ignoreEligibilityError - A flag on whether to skip throwing exception when eligibility rule return false. If true, ignore failure. If false, throw exception. Default to false.
    Returns:
    the ErrorList object if any, or null if there are no errors

    • removeItem

    public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean removeItem(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object itemIdOrObj,
                                                    com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hardDelete)
    Deletes an item from the the basket and returns indication if the item is found

    Parameters:
    itemIdOrObj - The id of the basket item which is to be deleted, or the basket item object
    hardDelete - Boolean value:
  • If true the basket item is physically deleted from the basket
  • If false it is marked as deleted, but not physically deleted from the basket. It is still a valid item in basket, and it will be deleted once the storeInDB API is called.
    By default, this value is false.
    Returns:
    True if the item is found, false if there is no such item in the order

    • restoreFromSnapshot

    public void restoreFromSnapshot()
    Restores the basket content in the memory from the last snapshot

    runCatalogQuery

    public CatalogQueryResult runCatalogQuery(Basket theInventory,
                                          com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean throwCompilerErrors,
                                          String query,
                                          com.conceptwave.scripting.Object[] params)
    Runs a Catalog query. The objects that constitute context of the catalog rules - the inventory and the Catalog context object must be set before the API is invoked or given as parameters to the API. Catalog queries allow search of Catalog hierarchies, item properties, and attribute values, item to item associations and item prices (charge type associations). The result of the query is a Catalog Query Result object.

    Parameters:
    theInventory - The user inventory or null. If null the value set in the Catalog context will be used
    throwCompilerErrors - If true the API will throw exception DE9256 if there are compiler errors, which happens if there are errors in the query syntax. If false, will return a query result. In this case, the application can use the QueryResult.errorCount function to check if there are errors in the QueryResult object. By default, the parameter is false.
    query - The Catalog query specification string as defined in the documentation
    params - Search values for each question mark place holder in the query string as scanned from left to right. Each parameter can be atomic string, number, date or Boolean value or array of strings or numbers. If array it must contain values of the same data type (i.e. strings or numbers).
    Returns:
    The catalog query result object.
    Notes: this function returns null if the hierarchy that the query is being run on does not contain any item. Otherwise, if will return a non-null result object, even when the object does not contain any items (i.e. when none of the items in the hierarchy satisfy the query criteria).

    storeInBulk

    public String storeInBulk()
    Deprecated. As of 5.1. SP 12. Please use the order save API or the basket storeInDB API

    Stores the changed components of this basket in the database

    Returns:
    Returns the basket ID

    storeInDB

    public String storeInDB()
    Stores the changed components of this basket in the database. If the basket is part of an order please use the order save API.

    Returns:
    Returns the basket ID

    validate

    public ErrorList validate(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean returnOnFirstError)
    Validates all the basket items in the basket.

    Parameters:
    returnOnFirstError - Whether to stop after the first validation error (when true), or to continue the validation process to the end (when false). Note that warning are not counted. By default, this parameter is false.
    Returns:
    null if the basket is valid, or an ErrorList object with the errors found during the validation.
